q: CAMILLE GRAMMER MEETS KAYTE WALSH`` You are respectfully considerate and yet pleased for the new developments in my life,'' Kelsey Grammer responded coyly, before talking about how his children are handling the divorce. In his keynote speech Monday at the trade show, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer rebutted that suggestion.`` Nokia's support will help Windows Phone overall to build strength versus other mobile platforms,'' Steve Ballmer said. That's not just good for Nokia, that's good for all our handset partners. Steve Ballmer also demonstrated some of the improvements that are coming to Windows Phone 7 this year. They include a faster Web browser and quicker switching between applications. Shares of Nokia fell 52 cents,
